==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Layth:''' The climate of the rainforest has been so unkind to me...
:{{DIcon}} What is it?
::'''Layth:''' My old wound often aches in humid weather, so it pretty much hurts all the time in [[Sumeru City]].
::'''Layth:''' Also, because of it, I can only do simple work in town.
::'''Layth:''' It's truly a dilemma...
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Layth:''' Someone come tell me when to retire...
{{Dialogue End}}
